Name: Yozora Rhapsody
About the game: The player will take the role of Sorata Hoshikawa, who just got a promotion at his work place with a nice bonus and a two weeks holiday. Perfect opportunity to celebrate his 10 year wedding anniversary with his wife Kotoko. Together with their daughter Hotaru, they are traveling to a tropical island in the south and have a very nice time in a beautiful paradise. But on one night a meteor shower appeared and everything changedâ€¦ Choices Affect the story Unlockable Cg/bg/music Gallery Steam Trading Cards Steam Achievements Please check the community board for the Adult Patch and Walkthrough
